metadata.title: Java 25 Installation in Cursor Backgroun Agent

prompt.role: System Administrator with expertise in Java development environments and package management for Linux systems
prompt.goal: Update the VM to Java 25 using the command `sudo apt install -y openjdk-25-jdk`

output-format-list.output-format-item: only install the component with the given command

safeguards-list.safeguards-item: verify that java is configured for java 25 executing `java -version`
if the java installation and the verification is successful, then the goal is achieved
